title: Stuck at ''Logging on...''
body: It is already the second day since my LoL client keeps telling me ''logging on..'' forever, I waited 2 hours and it still didn't log in! Pls someone tell me how to fix it.

replies.body: Your network might have an issue reaching the authentication servers, so it's failing to get you in and would eventually time out.  You should go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot towards a fix.  I hope that helps!
I did all of those thing and nothing helped me, so still how can I fix it?!

Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team will work with you to figure this out.  Download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well to collect some logs to help us get more context.  We will reply back to your ticket as soon as we can.

Same issues .... The game gets stuck after authentication and have even put and done the DNS thingy .... Still it doesnt work the game is still loggin on after authentication !!


And then after a bit time say unknown error .... So what the hell am i supposed to figure out from that???
ok, wait, my LoL client typed that I couldn't connect to PvP.net servers, what can I do?
RIOT pls fix! I can't play my favourite game :/
for me just 20 minutes ago, came home, open the game, stucked, only ctrl+alt+del can help to get rid of app in memory
